AI Action场景:
Update Deal Stage
Update Contact
Log Activity
必需数据字段:
• Deal ID / Contact ID
• Current Stage
• Target Stage
• Pipeline Options
数据来源/API:
• GET /deals/:id 获取当前状态
• GET /pipelines 获取 Stage 枚举
• PATCH /deals/:id 更新 Stage
• Context: Agent 需识别 Deal 名称并匹配 ID

必需数据字段:
• Opportunity ID
• Current Stage
• Target Stage
数据来源/API:
• GET /sobjects/Opportunity/:id
• PATCH /sobjects/Opportunity/:id
• Stage 枚举来自 Salesforce Schema

AI Action场景:
Status Change
Assignee Update
Priority Change
必需数据字段:
• Issue ID
• Current Status
• Target Status
• Assignee List
• Priority Options
数据来源/API:
• GET /issue/:id 获取当前状态
• GET /team/:id/states 获取 Status 枚举
• GET /team/:id/members 获取成员列表
• PATCH /issue/:id 更新状态

AI Action场景:
Status Transition
Assignee Update
Priority Change
必需数据字段:
• Issue Key
• Current Status
• Target Status
• Transition ID
• User List
数据来源/API:
• GET /issue/:key
• GET /issue/:key/transitions 获取可用转换
• GET /user/search 搜索用户
• POST /issue/:key/transitions

AI Action场景:
Send Message
Update Message
Reply in Thread
必需数据字段:
• Channel ID / DM ID
• Message Text
• Thread TS (for replies)
• User/Channel List
数据来源/API:
• GET /conversations.list 获取频道列表
• GET /users.list 获取用户列表
• POST /chat.postMessage 发送消息
• Context: Agent 需从对话历史获取 Channel 名称和 Thread context

AI Action场景:
Create Event
Update Event
Send Invite
必需数据字段:
• Event Title
• Start/End Time
• Attendees List
• Calendar ID
• Description
数据来源/API:
• GET /calendars 获取日历列表
• POST /calendars/:id/events 创建事件
• Agent 需从对话提取时间、参与者信息

AI Action场景:
Draft Email
Send Email
Reply to Thread
必需数据字段:
• To (Email Address)
• Subject
• Email Body
• Thread ID (for replies)
• Attachments (optional)
数据来源/API:
• GET /messages/:id 获取原邮件（回复时）
• POST /messages/send 发送邮件
• GET /contacts 获取联系人（支持搜索）
• Context: Agent 需从对话识别收件人名称并补全邮箱

必需数据字段:
• To (Email Address)
• Subject
• Email Body
• CC/BCC (optional)
数据来源/API:
• GET /me/contacts 获取联系人
• POST /me/sendMail 发送邮件
• GET /me/messages/:id 获取邮件

AI Action场景:
Create Campaign
Send Campaign
Schedule Campaign
必需数据字段:
• Campaign Name
• Subject Line
• Email Content (HTML)
• Audience/List ID
• Send Time (optional)
数据来源/API:
• GET /lists 获取受众列表
• POST /campaigns 创建 Campaign
• POST /campaigns/:id/actions/send 发送
• Agent 需从指令提取 Campaign 内容和目标受众

必需数据字段:
• From Email
• To List
• Subject
• HTML Content
• Template ID (optional)
数据来源/API:
• GET /marketing/lists 获取联系人列表
• POST /mail/send 发送邮件
• GET /templates 获取模板列表

AI Action场景:
Create Survey
Send Survey
Distribute Survey
必需数据字段:
• Survey Title
• Questions
• Recipient List
• Survey Link
• Distribution Method
数据来源/API:
• POST /forms 创建表单
• GET /forms/:id 获取表单链接
• 需集成邮件 API 进行分发
• Agent 需从指令生成问卷问题结构

必需数据字段:
• Survey Title
• Questions
• Collector Type
• Recipient Emails
数据来源/API:
• POST /surveys 创建调研
• POST /surveys/:id/collectors 创建收集器
• POST /collectors/:id/messages 发送邀请

AI Action场景:
Create Page
Update Page
Add Comment
必需数据字段:
• Space ID
• Page ID (更新时)
• Page Title
• Content (HTML/Storage Format)
• Parent Page ID
数据来源/API:
• GET /spaces 获取空间列表
• GET /content 搜索页面
• POST /content 创建页面
• PUT /content/:id 更新页面
• Agent 需从对话识别要更新的页面标题

AI Action场景:
Create Doc
Update Doc Content
Insert Text
必需数据字段:
• Document ID (更新时)
• Document Title
• Content Text
• Insert Position
• Folder ID (创建时)
数据来源/API:
• POST /documents 创建文档
• POST /documents/:id:batchUpdate 批量更新
• GET /documents/:id 获取文档内容
• GET /drive/files 搜索文档
